title: SGS Solutions marketing website (computer sales & service)

requirements.text: Create a responsive multi-page company website for “SGS Solutions” (computer sales and service) with clear navigation and polished marketing content in English.

quotes: Create website computer sales service company SGS Solutions

acceptanceCriteria: Site has a consistent header navigation and footer on all pages.
All pages are responsive (mobile/tablet/desktop) and readable.
All user-facing copy is in English and references SGS Solutions consistently.

requirements.text: Implement core pages and sections suitable for a computer sales & service company: Home, Products, Services, About, and Contact pages. Home should include a hero section, value propositions, featured offerings, and a call-to-action to Contact.

quotes: Create website computer sales service company SGS Solutions

acceptanceCriteria: Home page includes: hero, 3–6 value props, featured Products/Services previews, and a prominent CTA button leading to Contact.
Products page lists at least 3 product categories (e.g., laptops, desktops, accessories) with short descriptions and placeholder items.
Services page lists at least 4 services (e.g., repairs, upgrades, diagnostics, maintenance) with clear descriptions.
About page includes a brief company story/mission and a “Why choose us” section.
Contact page includes contact info and a contact form.

requirements.text: Add a Contact form UI with validation (name, email, phone optional, subject, message) and submit success/error states.

quotes: Create website computer sales service company SGS Solutions

acceptanceCriteria: Form validates required fields and email format before submission.
Submit button shows loading state while submitting.
On success, form clears and shows a success message; on failure, shows an error message.

requirements.text: Create backend support to store contact form submissions in the canister, and expose methods to create and list submissions (listing should be restricted to authenticated users via Internet Identity).

quotes: Create website computer sales service company SGS Solutions

acceptanceCriteria: Backend provides a public method to create a contact submission (with timestamp).
Backend provides an authenticated-only method to list submissions (newest-first).
Unauthenticated calls to list submissions are rejected with a clear error.
Data persists across canister upgrades (stable storage).

requirements.text: Add a simple authenticated “Inbox” page in the frontend to view stored contact submissions (read-only). Access should require Internet Identity login.

quotes: Create website computer sales service company SGS Solutions

acceptanceCriteria: When not logged in, the Inbox page prompts the user to sign in.
When logged in, the Inbox page displays a list of submissions with timestamp, name, email, subject, and message.
Inbox gracefully handles empty state and loading/error states.

requirements.text: Define and apply one coherent visual theme for SGS Solutions across the entire site (colors, typography, spacing, components) with a professional “computer services” feel (avoid blue & purple).

quotes: Create website computer sales service company SGS Solutions

acceptanceCriteria: A single consistent theme is applied across pages (buttons, cards, headings, links).
Color palette does not rely on blue/purple as the primary brand colors.
Typography and spacing are consistent and readable.

requirements.text: Add basic SEO and accessibility essentials: meaningful page titles/meta descriptions per page, semantic headings, keyboard navigability, and accessible form labels/errors.

quotes: Create website computer sales service company SGS Solutions

acceptanceCriteria: Each page sets a distinct document title and meta description.
All form fields have associated labels and accessible error messages.
Site is usable via keyboard navigation and has sensible focus states.
Headings use a logical hierarchy (H1 then H2/H3).

requirements.text: Generate and include static brand images and illustrations for SGS Solutions (logo + simple marketing visuals), store them under frontend/public/assets/generated, and render them in the UI (e.g., header logo and Home hero).

quotes: Create website computer sales service company SGS Solutions

acceptanceCriteria: Generated images are present in frontend/public/assets/generated and referenced directly by the frontend.
Header displays the SGS Solutions logo.
Home hero includes a relevant illustration/visual.

constraints: Respect the single-actor backend architecture (all Motoko logic in backend/main.mo).
Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui or other immutable paths; compose UI using those components.
Do not introduce external databases or third-party auth providers (only Internet Identity for authentication).
nonGoals: E-commerce checkout, payments, shipping, and inventory management.
Real-time chat or live support features.
CMS/admin editing of product/service content (content can be static for initial version).

required: Modern minimalist logo for “SGS Solutions” in a tech/service style (sgs-logo.dim_512x512.png)
Wide hero illustration showing computer repair/sales theme, clean vector style (sgs-hero-illustration.dim_1600x900.png)
Set of 4 simple line icons representing service offerings (sgs-service-icons.dim_512x512.png)
